[docs]def rnd(x, places):
    if not places:
        mult = 10**2
    else:
        mult = 10**places
    return math.floor(x*mult+0.5) / mult




[docs]class obj:
    def __init__(self):
        self.classname = self.__class__.__name__

    def __str__(self):
        return self.classname   # TODO +o(x)
